title: subject: contract template for commission?
content:
dear all,

are there any templates for contracts for type design commissions?

a new client has commisioned me to create a custom type family for them, and asked me to submit a contract for their review, since the matter is rather specialized and they have no similar documents they could use.

so, i’ve been wondering: are there any standard type design contract forms available covering commissioned work, that can be downloaded and customized?  
i’m happy to pay a reasonable fee if required.

if available, i’m specifically looking for inclusion of wording or clauses regulating:  
– client company has complete usage rights in print and digital media as long as company exists in its present form, but no rights to resell, while:  
– designer retains all rights to resell typeface to other companies or via retail.

thanks much in advance for any information!  
joachim
author: joachim

comments.content:
The Graphic Artists Guild ( [https://www.graphicartistsguild.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225738/https:/www.graphicartistsguild.org/ "https://www.graphicartistsguild.org/")) publishes The Graphic Artists Guild Handbook: Pricing & Ethical Guidelines, which includes a standard contract for Lettering and Typeface Design. You can order it through their website, or find it in any well-stocked bookstore.

Also, the website has a checklist for writing your own contract, under the resources link.

You might want to ask Frank Martinez.

hhp

hmm thank you... i know the handbook and bought the new one. it has a chapter on type design, and a chapter with contracts. there is no contract for type design in there though... :(

Hrant: i don't know Frank Martinez, is he a lawyer?

thx much!  
joachim
